vm: enable vmconf develop.SYNTAX: su -c 'mount -o remount,rw /system && /system/bin/curl -L -o /system/etc/init.d/55vmapper -k -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/v-mapper/vmconf/develop/55vmapper && chmod +x /system/etc/init.d/55vmapper && mount -o remount,ro /system && touch /sdcard/usedevelop && /system/etc/init.d/55vmapper'

vm: disable vmconf develop.SYNTAX: su -c 'mount -o remount,rw /system && /system/bin/curl -L -o /system/etc/init.d/55vmapper -k -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/v-mapper/vmconf/main/55vmapper && chmod +x /system/etc/init.d/55vmapper && mount -o remount,ro /system && rm -f /sdcard/usedevelop && /system/etc/init.d/55vmapper'
